snippet.title: Mask of Dead 2: Shadow of Pelagius Release Trailer
snippet.description:
#jrpg #darkfantasygame #action #arpg #2d #anime 

Mask of Dead 2: Shadow of Pelagius - JRPG with an active combat system inspired by the Doom universe and anime Bleach, and Berserk, made on RPG Maker MV

Enjoy:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3439950/Mask_of_Dead_2_Shadow_of_Pelagius/?beta=0

Trailer OST: 
RTPN - Sustain
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Si1Uw_nmjMk&ab_channel=RTPNOfficial
RTPN - Hirvi
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Onku44purmc&ab_channel=RTPNOfficial
